column5: I have to say thank you to Howell marine in Chatham once again amazing service at no charge. Last time they tuned my carbs up just because, when they were doing another job. Then Saturday I was having trouble with my boats electrical I stopped in on my way home and was given the fix to do at home it was just a loose wire but could have cost a lot if it was not for there knowledge of boats and free advice.  Thanks again Howell marine above and beyond what most places would do.
Great to hear Mike,that there are still some honest and good people out there.
Always nice when you find a dealership you can trust !!
Good for them! They realize that actions speak louder than decals on boats and patches on 'pro-staff' shirts.
good karma to good folks. see guys it works
Amen to that, good things happen to good people every now and then
X2 on that, almost worth the 5 1/2 hour drive for quality service, and piece of mind
One other thing that shocked me was they were open at 2pm on a Saturday in November.
Maybe winterizing still?,sounds like a great shop thou!
